title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 460.3 - Application review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 460.3 - Application review

State Regulations

The authority shall review each industrial power application
made to the authority and it may request additional information from an
applicant to assist in its review. After completion of a review and evaluation
of the relative merits of all applications under consideration in accordance
with the criteria set forth in this Part, the president will submit recommended
allocations to the authority's trustees for their approval or
disapproval. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

460.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
